attributes.action: launch an investigation with the competition commission/OFT into the unfair monopoly of 'Haribo' in the penny sweet industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to launch an investigation with the competition commission/OFT into the unfair monopoly of 'Haribo' in the penny sweet industry. What happened to the days when you pointed out your selection to the overly happy but slightly sinister shop keeper, who then duly plucked your selected penny sweets and placed them into a small white bag? In the days when penny sweets actually cost a penny (or 2p for such occasional specialities such as a drumstick lolly!). We feel 'Haribo' has taken over this industry using cruel and barbaric anti-competitive tactics and must be stopped!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
